hero.title: GRAMAGE
hero.description: Textile manufacturing experts with our own facilities. From design to final product, we create unique textile solutions.

about.title: Our Essence
about.subtitle: We transform spaces with passion and commitment, creating environments that inspire and endure

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: We facilitate and accompany the creation of textile projects, putting our industry at the service of our partners.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: We are inspired by nature, society and culture, traditions and people's thoughts. The long-term philosophy seeks to generate joy, comfort, quality and avant-garde.

values.title: Values
list: We believe in a healthy environment
We believe that love is the future
